test-e2e-course-authoring:
  needs: create-cache
  runs-on: ${{ matrix.os }}
  strategy:
    matrix:
      os: [macos-latest]
  steps:
    - uses: actions/checkout@v3

    - name: Setup Node
      uses: actions/setup-node@v3
      with:
        node-version: 16.13.2 # matching Elctron's version of node

    - name: Get Cache Directory Path
      id: yarn-cache-dir-path
      run: echo "::set-output name=dir::$(yarn cache dir)"

    - name: Cache Lockfile
      uses: actions/cache@v3
      id: yarn-cache-lockfile
      with:
        path: ${{ steps.yarn-cache-dir-path.outputs.dir }}
        key: ${{ runner.os }}-yarn-${{ hashFiles('**/yarn.lock') }}
        restore-keys: |
          ${{ runner.os }}-yarn-

    - name: Cache Modules
      uses: actions/cache@v3
      id: yarn-cache-modules
      with:
        path: node_modules
        key: ${{ runner.os }}-modules-${{ hashFiles('**/yarn.lock') }}
        restore-keys: |
          ${{ runner.os }}-modules-

    - name: Install Dependencies
      if: |
        steps.yarn-cache-lockfile.outputs.cache-hit != 'true' ||
        steps.yarn-cache-modules.outputs.cache-hit != 'true'
      run: yarn install --frozen-lockfile

    - name: Install Playwright Dependencies
      run: npx playwright install --with-deps chromium

    - name: Test
      run: yarn run test:e2e:course
